channel.title: Error in Artificer Spell List
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Error in Artificer Spell List" - Dragons Breath

item.title: Re: Error in Artificer Spell List
item.content:encoded: Removed it from the list and updated the page to indicate that it's in the sorcerer and wizard spell lists only, thanks for catching that!

item.title: Error in Artificer Spell List
item.content:encoded: I noticed that one of my favorite spells; Dragon's Breath, was on the Artificer spell list on this site when I thought it was not. I did some digging and discovered it is not a spell available to artificers. I don't know if there are other like mistakes on the spell list but I could find no source for Dragon's Breath on Artificers.
